'''Ready Player Zero''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete ''[[A Little Game]].''

==Trivia==
*The name of the achievement is likely a reference to Ernest Cline's 2011 science fiction novel "{{w|Ready Player One}}".
